section_title: The SBI adopted conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2009/L.8). CAPACITY BUILDING (CONVENTION)
sentences: Noting the hard work undertaken by the contact group, Co-Chair Gwage regretted that the group was not able to reach consensus on either a COP decision or SBI conclusions on the second comprehensive review of the capacity building framework.
He cited lack of time to complete the work.
Consideration of the issue will continue at SBI 31. CAPACITY BUILDING (PROTOCOL): Co-Chair Gwage reported that no agreement was reached.
Consideration of the issue will continue at SBI 31.
